name: Get Out Of My Dungeon
description:
Get Out Of My Dungeon is a billard-roguelike game realized for the Ludum Dare 41 (Combine 2 Incompatible Genres).

Gameplay

You play as a quiet orc trying to push the adventurers away from his home.

Credits

Game Design & Programming : Bady Mebarki

Graphics assets : Kenney

Fonts : Daniel Linssen
